dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S688 IS: To permanently extend the private mortgage insurance tax deduction.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Stabenow (for herself and Mr. Crapo) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To permanently extend the private mortgage insurance tax deduction.

section.header: Permanent extension of deduction for mortgage insurance premiums

subsection.text: Subparagraph (E) of section 163(h)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking clause (iv).
The amendment made by this section shall apply to amounts paid or accrued after December 31, 2013, and to amounts properly allocable to periods after such date.
